original_title: Rik Roberts: Put Down the Sweet Tea
overview: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working tobacco and horse farms. Today, the focus is on harvesting big laughs without the filth.
title: Rik Roberts: Put Down the Sweet Tea
